idea: We are a Mutual Fund Digital Platform company with a cutting edge technology. We try to empower the mutual fund distributors to operate their whole mutual fund business online and provide better service to their customers digitally.
name: FINCUS CAPITAL SERVICES LLP

idea:
Apaar Information Systems is an India based technology solutions consulting company. Apaar is a Sanskrit word meaning boundless.

Just like our name, we are not tied up to just one way of solving problems. Our solutions are tailor made, to suit needs, size, structure and budgets.

Our team with decades of experience in IT technology domain like BigData, Analytics, Robotics, Artificial Intelligence & Advisory services are up to date with latest market technologies and bespoke solutions and other customized solutions best suited for today’s organizational requirements.

While Modern tools and prominent methodologies are deployed, there are also customised ERP and solution specific solutions like our Laundry Management System and Ware House Management applications that have been specifically designed for Hotels, Hospitals and Warehouses.

Our team have effectively and efficiently automated processes to allow Human Resources focus on tasks that they can make an impact on.

Our company is currently working on projects from across industries like Healtcare,Banking & Insurance, FMCG, Retail & Manufacturing

What’s assured at Apaar is solutions without boundaries and possibilities that are limitless.
name: APAAR INFORMATION SYSTEMS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: "अपना किसान" is trying to build an circular economy where we aim to share equal profit with farmers for their produce. We aim to create a economy where good food and adulteration free food is not luxury but it's basic right of every individual.
name: APANA KISAN

idea:
www.amonaapparels.in

Manufacturer and export, e-commerce, online store, and offline store, own brand(AMOFAB), new startup Mayur, born on July 26, 1983, is an Indian entrepreneur in the garment and textile industry.

He has worked in the garment and textile sector for at least ten years. He has years of work

experience with clients such as B2X, Apple, Vodafone, Google, etc. His first company, RUDRA

GARMENT is active on an international and national level, and his second new company,

Amona Apparels Pvt. Ltd., has a stylish yet affordable garment line called AMOFAB, as well as

four new upcoming companies in the sector. He is a dreamer and doer by nature. He aspires

to empower and motivate individuals by providing them with fantastic career opportunities,

in this direction, MAYUR BAVISKAR VISION can be seen as a successful attempt to not only

create more job opportunities in India but also it adds value to the economy. Similarly,

BHAGWAN BAVISKAR FOUNDATION, an upcoming project which also aspires to provide job

and business opportunities to needy young boys and girls through the organization and

training in the textile and garment industry and other service-oriented social activities.
name: AMONA APPARELS PRIVATE LIMITED
